title: Strengthening e-Learning Practical Competencies: Mobile Microlearning for Enhancing Mathematical Reasoning and Proof Skills

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary algebra and geometry knowledge, along with logical reasoning experience
context.additional_context: Instructional design competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can construct proofs comprehensively through a 4-stage sequential approach: subject knowledge → strategic knowledge → methodological knowledge → integrated problem-solving
Learners can identify and correct logical flaws in over 70% of proof tasks by integrating composite resources (knowledge elements + strategies + methods) via a simultaneous approach
Learners can design argument structures within 3 minutes using 5 situation-specific evidence templates provided in a mobile environment.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
